title: Now I know why kass is op
body: He gets wrecked hard by our riven but he still one shots me when I'm ADC.

replies.body: OP prob got 1 shotted when he was sitting on 20% hp (let alone how squishy adc's are in the first place), and thought that was outrageously broken.
"an assassin can burst me, so OP!!!!1!"

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WYF4gMAZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-24T07:09:29.240+0000)
>
> "an assassin can burst me, so OP!!!!1!"

To be fair it's pretty bad design when an assassin can get rekt in lane, and still do their job while building tank/bruiser. Assassins are meant to be high risk high reward. Kassadin can get shrekt in lane, build roa, and still be fed.

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WYF4gMAZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-24T07:30:11.401+0000)
>
> To be fair it's pretty bad design when an assassin can get rekt in lane, and still do their job while building tank/bruiser. Assassins are meant to be high risk high reward. Kassadin can get shrekt in lane, build roa, and still be fed.

Although I'm sure it wasn't 0/89/0 Kassadin 100-0-ing an ADC. He probably would picked up some kills or assists or csed really well and ADC probably wasn't full hp.

That or the Kass just farmed really really well in despite dying a few times.
How dare I play a hero with no scaling defense nor defensive items die to a character building just as offensively as I am!!

Kassadin cannot 100/0, he can get close but he wont technically blow you up. (unless he has max Riftwalk stacks and teleports on you and yeah) buy MR and play safe, Kassadin wont fight a prepared enemy 1v2.. exactly like Akali, but the whiners will get him nerfed again sooner or later.
